data:item.name: FRDM-STBI-A8971
data:item.display_title: Sensor shield board for FXLS8971CF 3-axis accelerometer for Industrial, Medical applications requiring excellent performance over temperature.
data:item.overview:
Sensor toolbox development board for FXLS8971CF with enablement software tools.Sensor Boards:
  • Sensor shield board: FRDM-STBI-A8971 is a sensor add-on/companion shield board for FXLS8971CF 3-axis accelerometer for precision inclinometer IoT applications
Embedded Software Framework:
  • IoT Sensing SDK: Provides Embedded sensor projects for the demo through MCUXpresso
  • Sensors SW Component Library: Provides platform agnostic software source files, modules, and libraries for sensor drivers
Evaluation and Visualization Software:
  • FreeMASTER Sensor Tool: Provides out-of-box sensor demo and application development platform for FXLS8971CF
